fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces

Interface RequiredI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ComponentServiceI
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ConnectorI, DataConnectorI, DataInboundPortI, DataOfferedI.PushI, DataOutboundPortI, DataRequiredI, DataRequiredI.PullI, DataTwoWayConnectorI, DataTwoWayI, DynamicComponentCreationI, IntercessionI, IntrospectionI, OutboundPortI, ReflectionI, TwoWayI, TwoWayPortI<TWI>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractConnector, AbstractDataConnector, AbstractDataInboundPort, AbstractDataInboundPortForPlugin, AbstractDataOutboundPort, AbstractDataOutboundPortForPlugin, AbstractDataTwoWayConnector, AbstractDataTwoWayPort, AbstractDataTwoWayPort.OutProxy, AbstractDataTwoWayPortForPlugin, AbstractOutboundPort, AbstractTwoWayConnector, AbstractTwoWayConnector.ProxyToOtherComponent, AbstractTwoWayPort, AbstractTwoWayPort.OutProxy, AbstractTwoWayPortForPlugin, ActiveDataConnector, DataConnector, DataTwoWayConnector, DataTwoWayConnector.ProxyToOtherComponent, DynamicComponentCreationConnector, DynamicComponentCreationInboundPort, DynamicComponentCreationOutboundPort, IntercessionConnector, IntercessionInboundPort, IntercessionOutboundPort, IntrospectionConnector, IntrospectionInboundPort, IntrospectionOutboundPort, ReflectionConnector, ReflectionInboundPort, ReflectionOutboundPort

    public interface RequiredI
extends ComponentServiceI
    The interface RequiredI represents the most general required interface for a component in this component model.

    Description

    Components have required and offered interfaces. Required interfaces are the ones through which the component calls its companion components to obtain services and data from them. Offered interfaces are the ones through which a component is called to deliver services and data.

    Created on : 2011-10-31

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
